parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if Picture in Picture (Render to Texture) is enabled.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isPipEnabled'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>PIPon = [[isPipEnabled]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getShadowDistance]], [[setShadowDistance]]
</value></part></template></root>
